channel.title: Sponsored server status question
channel.description:
Well i may pay for my server to become sponsored but it says no donations? Can this be clarified a bit?
You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations. This includes moderator, admin, and any other types of staff on your forum

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored server status question
item.dc:creator: @x_united_x x united x
item.description:
@x_united_x wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:367982”][quote author=EmulousGuru link=topic=464126.msg3394745#msg3394745 date=1289255744]

You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.

Read closely.
It doesn’t say anything about donations not being allowed.

You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.

Same statement, just crossed out the first two examples. (Real/fake money/items)

Meaning, you can receive donations, as a support-type payment, but you may NOT offer a reward for such payments.
[/quote]

This is pretty much what I meant. You can’t sell staff positions on your server, even if you say you give a staff position to someone who donates, I still consider that selling a staff position. Understand?[/quote]

bro i wanna get last possison for united pkz umm and btw is it around $50++?were i bid itd not as simple

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored server status question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

EmulousGuru:

[quote]You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.

Read closely.
It doesn’t say anything about donations not being allowed.

You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.

Same statement, just crossed out the first two examples. (Real/fake money/items)

Meaning, you can receive donations, as a support-type payment, but you may NOT offer a reward for such payments.[/quote]

This is pretty much what I meant. You can’t sell staff positions on your server, even if you say you give a staff position to someone who donates, I still consider that selling a staff position. Understand?

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored server status question
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

EmulousGuru:

[quote]You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.

Read closely.
It doesn’t say anything about donations not being allowed.

You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.

Same statement, just crossed out the first two examples. (Real/fake money/items)

Meaning, you can receive donations, as a support-type payment, but you may NOT offer a reward for such payments.[/quote]

So basically you just can’t give donators staff.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored server status question
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for real world or real runescape money or items or donations.
Read closely. It doesn't say anything about donations not being allowed.
[b]You may not sell any type of staff position on your server for [/b][s]real world or real runescape money or items or[/s] [b]donations.[/b]
Same statement, just crossed out the first two examples. (Real/fake money/items)

Meaning, you can receive donations, as a support-type payment, but you may NOT offer a reward for such payments.

Read full topic
